channel.title: Diablo II Make Characters Active
channel.description:
Hey mates,
I've been looking for a program, hack, or cheat that will make sure my characters don't expire, but haven't found one so I came to you guys...the scripters. :) I have over 24 characters and I don't want to wait 2 hours in the game for each one, because that is the only way that they become active. I won't have to click on them again until 3 months then. Is there a program, hack, or cheat that will put one mule in the game for 2 hours, logout, and then click on the second mule, then doing the same thing over and over. If anyone knows a program that does this, please tell me. If not, can someone please make a script or program to make what I described above happen? I don't know if it is possible, but anyway, I just wanted to ask. Thanks, and have a nice day!
Thanks again, Leader
P.S. If you need any more information about what I need this program/script to do, please contact me via PM or in this thread. Also, if you don't mind creating the program/script, please contact me too. Once again, thanks. Also, if this was in the wrong section, feel free to move it - I apologize for my mistake.

item.title: Diablo II Make Characters Active
item.dc:creator: @leader leader
item.description:
@leader wrote:

Weibs:

I’d be glad to make this, but I’d need a little more information, check your PM.

Thanks, but it cannot be done. Check your PM.

Read full topic

item.title: Diablo II Make Characters Active
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

I’d be glad to make this, but I’d need a little more information, check your PM.

Read full topic
